titles.title: Jesus Christ is still the same

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God Sent To Us His mighty Prophet
With the Spoken Word
The Pillar of Fire has descended
And vindicated His own Word

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus
Jesus Christ is still the same
Yesterday, eternally
Just believe and you shall see Him
Jesus is the same today

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
God leads His Children out of Babel
As He did so long time ago
Oh Come ye out of Her My People!
Obey the Word of this last hour!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hear the cry of God's Eagle
Oh! You My People be prepared
The Lord is now in His Coming
Soon we shall meet Him in the air
